Welcome to ISO Standards Games

Interactive learning of ISO/IEC standards through gamification

Learn about important software quality standards through engaging, interactive games:

  • ISO/IEC 25010 - Software Quality
  • ISO/IEC/IEEE 29148 - Requirements Engineering
  • ISO 9241 - Ergonomics of Human-System Interaction

"Standards are the foundation of quality software development. Through gamification, we make learning these essential standards engaging and effective."
